document_data.name: ''Banner of Renown''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''banner of renown''''' was a magical flag that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|53}}
document_data.Description: This flag displayed the moon and trailing stars symbol of the Land of Fate.
document_data.Powers: When held during battle, this flag inspired all [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] persons within {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} with supernatural morale, infusing them with bravery and strength of arm. If the bearer of the flag was killed, the flag dissipated and all magical powers vanished instantly.
